summary: Comprehensive testing completed for the fully implemented Itinerari page (/itinerari). All major functionality working correctly including hero section, 3 detailed itinerary sections with content, anchor navigation, mobile responsiveness, and integration with existing navbar/routing.
passed_tests: Itinerari page (/itinerari) loads correctly with complete hero section
Hero title 'Itinerari in Gommone a La Maddalena' displays correctly
Hero CTA buttons work: Prenota (FareHarbor) and WhatsApp with correct links
Parco Nazionale section renders with 4 info cards as expected
All 3 itinerary overview cards visible: Il Classico, Caprera Completo, Lo Strategico
Anchor link navigation works: clicking cards scrolls to sections #itinerario-01, #itinerario-02, #itinerario-03
Itinerario 01 section complete: Spargi images, 4 stop/cala cards, Bocche di Bonifacio info banner
Budelli warning banner displays correctly (zona protetta rules)
Itinerario 02 section complete: Caprera/Coticcio content with Angela tip banner
Itinerario 03 shows complete timeline with 6 numbered steps
Parco Nazionale rules section renders with 4 rule cards (Ancoraggi, Aree, Gommoni)
Final CTA section with working Prenota and WhatsApp buttons
Navigation from home to /itinerari and back works correctly via navbar
Navbar shows 'Itinerari' as active link when on the page
All content images load correctly (hero, Spargi, Budelli, Piscine, Coticcio, etc.)
Mobile responsive layout works: hamburger menu, proper text scaling, CTA visibility
All data-testid selectors working for robust automated testing
success_percentage: Frontend: 100% - All Itinerari page features working perfectly
